subject: TIEMPO-329 Phase 1 - Backend Coordination Ready
body:
Hi Fulton! Phase 1 sprint is planned and ready to start. I need your help with 2 backend tasks in calendar-be-af:

TASK 1 (30 min): Update VisitorTrack.js to accept visitor_id field
- Add visitor_id to request body parsing (line ~91)
- Store visitor_id in MongoDB VisitorTrackingHistory
- Update deduplication logic to check visitor_id OR IP (line ~149)
- Test endpoint accepts: {visitor_id: uuid, page: /calendar, timezone: ..., timezoneOffset: ...}

TASK 2 (1 hour): Add isFirstLogin detection in UserLoginTrack.js
- Count existing logins for firebaseUserId
- Set isFirstLogin = (count === 0)
- Store isFirstLogin flag in loginEvent document
- Return isFirstLogin in response body

I'm starting frontend work now (visitorTracking.js utility). When you deploy to TEST, let me know so I can test end-to-end.

Questions or need clarification? Message me back or we can iterate quickly.

Ready when you are!
